message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $15,000 for the product. This offer includes an exclusive 3-month warranty and personalized support to ensure you get the most out of it. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the warranty and support, but $15,000 is a bit higher than I'm willing to go at this point. I'm happy to pay $12,000 for the product, which is the maximum I'm willing to spend. Let me know if that works for you.
